question: When did I watch the movie <movie name>?
query: PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT ?watchedOn WHERE { ?action a schem:WatchAction ; schem:object ?movie ; schem:endTime ?watchedOn . ?movie schem:name ?movieName . FILTER(LCASE(STR(?movieName)) = 'example') } LIMIT 1

question: Have I watched 'example'?
query: PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT ?watched WHERE {?action a schem:WatchAction ; schem:object ?movie . ?movie schem:name ?movieName . FILTER(LCASE(STR(?movieName)) = 'example') BIND (true AS ?watched) } LIMIT 1

question: How many movies have I watched this year?
query: PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT (COUNT(?movie) AS ?count) WHERE {?action a schem:WatchAction ; schem:object ?movie ; schem:endTime ?watchedOn . BIND(year(now()) AS ?currentYear) BIND (year(?watchedOn) AS ?watchedYear) FILTER(?currentYear = ?watchedYear)}

question: What is the last movie I watched?
query: PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT ?movieName WHERE { ?action a schem:WatchAction ; schem:object ?movie ; schem:endTime ?watchedOn . ?movie schem:name ?movieName . } ORDER BY DESC(?watchedOn) LIMIT 1

question: What are the titles of all movies I have watched?
query: PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT ?movieName WHERE { ?action a schem:WatchAction ; schem:object ?movie ; . ?movie schem:name ?movieName . } LIMIT 15

question: How many movies are in my 'to watch' list?
query: PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT (COUNT(?movie) AS ?count) WHERE { ?movie a schem:Movie . MINUS { ?action a schem:WatchAction ; schem:object ?movie ; }} LIMIT 15

question: Give me the description of the movie 'example'.
query: PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT ?description WHERE { ?movie a schem:Movie ; schem:name ?movieName ; schem:description ?description . FILTER(LCASE(STR(?movieName)) = LCASE(STR('star Wars'))) }LIMIT 15

question: Do I have any movies in space?
query: PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX schem: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?movie ?movieName WHERE { ?movie a schem:Movie ; schem:name ?movieName . FILTER( CONTAINS(LCASE(STR(?movieName)), 'space') || CONTAINS(LCASE(STR(?movieName)), 'star') ) } LIMIT 15

question: When is movie night?
query: PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?startTime ?endTime ?label WHERE { ?event a time:Interval;rdfs:label ?label;time:hasBeginning ?start;time:hasEnd ?end.?start time:inXSDDateTime ?startTime.?end time:inXSDDateTime ?endTime.FILTER (REGEX(LCASE(STR(?label)), 'movie') || REGEX(LCASE(STR(?label)), 'night')) }

question: Who was I talking about risotto with? What were we saying about it?
query: PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX sioc: <http://rdfs.org/sioc/ns#> SELECT ?name ?content WHERE {?conversation a sioc:Thread;sioc:has_creator ?person;sioc:content ?content.?person foaf:name ?name.FILTER REGEX(LCASE(STR(?content)), 'risotto') }

question: what was I saying about movie night?
query: PREFIX sioc: <http://rdfs.org/sioc/ns#> SELECT ?content WHERE {?conversation a sioc:Thread; sioc:content ?content.FILTER REGEX(LCASE(STR(?content)), 'movie night') }

question: What was I saying about cooking risotto and pasta?
query: PREFIX sioc: <http://rdfs.org/sioc/ns#> SELECT ?content WHERE {?conversation a sioc:Thread;sioc:content ?content.FILTER REGEX(LCASE(STR(?content)), 'pasta|cook|risotto|movie night') }
